TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolBarButton extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 表示 Windows 工具列按鈕。

span.span: Represents a Windows toolbar button.

summary.span: 雖然 會取代並且擴充之前版本的 控制項，不過您也可以選擇保留 ，以提供回溯相容性 (Backward Compatibility) 以及供未來使用。

span.span: Although replaces and extends the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項的父代控制項。 controls are parented by controls. 常見的屬性，來建立工具列按鈕之後設定為和。Common properties to set once the toolbar button has been created are and . 設定的按鈕，顯示的文字下方或右邊的映像的屬性。Set the property of the button to display text beneath or to the right of the image. 若要指派給按鈕的映像，藉由建立，將它指派給屬性的工具列，然後指派要的映像索引值個按鈕的屬性。To assign images to the buttons by creating an , assigning it to the property of the toolbar; then assign the image index value to the property of the button. 若要變更指派給工具列的工具列按鈕的外觀，請設定父工具列控制項的屬性。To change the appearance of the toolbar buttons assigned to the toolbar, set the property of the parent toolbar control. `ToolBarAppearance.Flat`外觀會讓按鈕較一般的外觀。The `ToolBarAppearance.Flat` appearance gives the buttons a flat appearance. 當滑鼠指標移到按鈕，其外觀會變更為三維。As the mouse pointer moves over the buttons, their appearance changes to three-dimensional. 按鈕分隔符號會顯示為線條，而不是按鈕的按鈕具有一般外觀時之間的空格。Button separators appear as lines rather than spaces between the buttons when the buttons have a flat appearance. 如果屬性設定為`ToolBarAppearance.Normal`按鈕三維形式顯示，且分隔符號會顯示為按鈕之間的間距。If the property is set to `ToolBarAppearance.Normal`, the buttons appear raised and three-dimensional, and the separators appear as a gap between the buttons. 您可以指派至按鈕如果屬性設定為`ToolBarButtonStyle.DropDown`。You can assign a to a button if the property is set to `ToolBarButtonStyle.DropDown`. 當按一下按鈕時，會顯示 [指派] 功能表。When the button is clicked, the assigned menu is displayed. 若要建立的集合控制項上顯示，將使用個別的按鈕方法屬性。To create a collection of controls to display on a , add the buttons individually by using the method of the property. 或者，您可以在其中加入數個工具列按鈕，使用方法。Alternatively, you can add several toolbar buttons using the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立和三個控制項。The following code example creates a and three controls. 工具列按鈕會指派給按鈕的集合、 集合指派給工具列和工具列加入至表單。The toolbar buttons are assigned to the button collection, the collection is assigned to the toolbar, and the toolbar is added to the form. 上事件的工具列屬性評估和開啟適當的對話方塊。On the event of the toolbar, the property of the is evaluated and the appropriate dialog box opened. 此程式碼需要，則，則，和所有已建立。This code requires that a , an , a , and a have all been created. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新建立沒有預設值或指派給它。A newly created has no default or assigned to it. 按鈕的預設樣式為`ToolBarButtonStyle.PushButton`。The button's default style is `ToolBarButtonStyle.PushButton`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立和三個控制、 指派按鈕加入工具列，並設定一些按鈕的通用屬性。The following code example creates a and three controls, assigns the buttons to the toolbar, and sets some of the buttons' common properties. 此程式碼需要， ，和已建立並至少有一個指派給它。This code requires that a , , and a have been created and the has at least one assigned to it. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and displays the assigned text on the button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新建沒有指派給它。The newly created has no assigned to it. 按鈕的預設樣式為。The button's default style is . `text`參數指派給屬性，並顯示新的工具列按鈕控制項上。The `text` parameter is assigned to the property and is displayed on the new toolbar button control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立和三個控制、 指派按鈕加入工具列，並設定一些按鈕的通用屬性。The following code example creates a and three controls, assigns the buttons to the toolbar, and sets some of the buttons' common properties. 此程式碼需要， ，和已建立並至少有一個指派給它。This code requires that a , , and a have been created and the has at least one assigned to it. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示會同時釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true 時，這個方法由任何 managed 物件持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次呼叫的其他物件。當覆寫小心不要參考先前處置好的呼叫中的物件。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 [實作 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需詳細資訊並，請參閱 [清除設定未受管理的 Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 和 [覆寫 Finalize 方法] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`false`、 無法按一下工具列按鈕，和按鈕的外觀會變更。When the property is set to `false`, the toolbar button cannot be clicked, and the button's appearance changes. 和指派給按鈕呈現灰色。如果影像或文字有多個色彩，它們會顯示在單一的灰色。The and assigned to the button appear grayed out. If the image or text has multiple colors, they display in a monochromatic gray.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設為`true`，工具列按鈕似乎有表面呈現灰色。When is set to `true`, the toolbar button appears to have its face grayed. 此外觀會不同於暗灰色的外觀時屬性設定為`false`因為部分推播外觀讓迷霧整個按鈕的圖示。This appearance is different from the dimmed appearance when the property is set to `false` since the partial-push appearance gives a haze to the entire button face. 這個屬性沒有任何作用，除非設為`ToggleButton`。This property has no effect unless the is set to `ToggleButton`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用，和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , and properties. 若要執行此範例，下列程式碼貼入表單，其中包含控制項稱為`RichTextBox1`。呼叫`InitializeToolBar`表單的建構函式中的方法或`Load`方法。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a control called `RichTextBox1`.Call the `InitializeToolBar` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

The bounding for a toolbar button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果和 [目前] 按鈕都，則此屬性會擷取中目前包含按鈕的週框。If the and the current button are both , then this property retrieves the bounding rectangle the button is currently contained in.

summary.span: 取得或設定工具列按鈕的樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style of the toolbar button.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果按鈕設定為您可以指定按下下拉式按鈕時顯示。If the button is set to you can specify a to be displayed when the drop-down button is pressed. 如果 style 設為`ToolBarButtonStyle.Separator`，做為按鈕分隔符號，而不是按鈕的工具列按鈕會出現。If the style is set to `ToolBarButtonStyle.Separator`, the toolbar button appears as a button separator and not as a button. `ToolBarButtonStyle.ToggleButton`樣式會使工具列按鈕的作用類似的切換按鈕，它可以在開啟或關閉狀態。The `ToolBarButtonStyle.ToggleButton` style causes the toolbar button to act like a toggle button; it can be in an on or off state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立和三個控制、 指派按鈕加入工具列，並設定一些按鈕的通用屬性。The following code example creates a and three controls, assigns the buttons to the toolbar, and sets some of the buttons' common properties. 此程式碼需要， ，和已建立並至少有一個指派給它。This code requires that a , , and a have been created and the has at least one assigned to it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 擷取或指派目前工具列按鈕與相關聯的資料。Retrieves or assigns the data currently associated with the toolbar button. 任何衍生型別可以指派給這個屬性。Any derived type can be assigned to this property. 如果您正在透過 Windows Form 設計工具設定這個屬性，就可以指派只有文字。If this property is being set through the Windows Forms designer, only text can be assigned. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用， ，和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , and properties. 若要執行此範例，下列程式碼貼入表單，其中包含控制項稱為`RichTextBox1`。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a control called `RichTextBox1`. 呼叫`InitializeToolBar`表單的建構函式中的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InitializeToolBar` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: The text displayed on the toolbar button.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設的文字屬性值為空字串 ("") 除非您建立具有的控制項，否則接受文字字串，做為參數的建構函式。The default the Text property value is an empty string ("") unless you created the control with the constructor that accepts the text string as a parameter. 取決於工具列按鈕上的文字方向按鈕的父代的屬性，這可以設定為其中一個列舉值。The orientation of the text on the toolbar button is determined by the property of the button's parent , which can be set to one of the enumeration values. 方向為相對於指派給按鈕的影像。The orientation is in relation to the image assigned to the button. 如果沒有影像指派給按鈕時，會有空間剩下的其中一個工具列按鈕的介面上。If no image is assigned to the button, there will be space left for one on the surface of the toolbar button. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立和三個控制、 指派按鈕加入工具列，並設定一些按鈕的通用屬性。The following code example creates a and three controls, assigns the buttons to the toolbar, and sets some of the buttons' common properties. 此程式碼需要， ，和已建立並至少有一個指派給它。This code requires that a , , and a have been created and the has at least one assigned to it. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ToolTipText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ToolTipText : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定顯示為按鈕工具提示的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that appears as a ToolTip for the button.

value.span: 滑鼠指標移到工具列按鈕上時顯示的文字。

span.span: The text that is displayed when the mouse pointer moves over the toolbar button.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要啟用的工具提示文字顯示，將滑鼠指標移至 按鈕時，設定按鈕的父代的屬性至`true`。To enable the display of the ToolTip text when the mouse pointer is moved over the button, set the property of the button's parent to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立和三個控制、 指派按鈕加入工具列，並設定一些按鈕的通用屬性。The following code example creates a and three controls, assigns the buttons to the toolbar, and sets some of the buttons' common properties. 此程式碼需要， ，和已建立並至少有一個指派給它。This code requires that a , , and a have been created and the has at least one assigned to it. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回包含型別和值的字串和屬性。The method returns a string that includes the type and the value of the and properties.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出工具列按鈕是否為可見。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the toolbar button is visible.

value.span: 如果工具列按鈕為可見的，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the toolbar button is visible; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果看不到工具列按鈕，它將不會顯示在工具列上，並因此無法接收使用者輸入。If the toolbar button is not visible, it will not be displayed on the toolbar, and therefore cannot receive user input.
